data.text: @GMA I feel bad for her, but she did this to herself. People OD on this stuff everyday and don't make the news.  Maybe focus on why there's such an epidemic instead of one person who can sing?

@GMA ... I was hoping GMA would down play this story, so to respect her situation and give her some space to deal. Using personal tragedies is a call between ratings vs. standards ....ratings won I guess. The story told later still would have helped others by he way, if that played in
@JABSND @GMA Strange, almost like they are humans who, in general struggle with addiction!

@GMA The question of our age that MUST be answered: why have so many of our musical icons struggled with drug addiction?  There's something there... #Lovato #DemiLovato #drugs #Elvis #MichaelJackson #Whitney
@GMA So sad.... its time to go after the dealer, is it a doctor? or is it someone on the streets?
